dcterms:description: Hex is a strategic board game whose complexity can be easily adjusted by changing the board size. It is played on a rhombic board where players aim to connect their sides of the board.
dcterms:title: Hex

dcterms:creator: D. Silver

dcterms:description: AlphaZero is an algorithm for teaching a neural network to play two-player zero-sum games entirely through self-play, augmenting the network-generated policy with a tree search.
dcterms:title: AlphaZero

dcterms:creator: S.-C. Huang

dcterms:description: MoHex is a pattern-based Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) player for the game Hex, capable of playing perfectly on board sizes up to 9x9.
dcterms:title: MoHex

dcterms:description: Polygames is a framework that improves zero learning in games, allowing for enhanced training and evaluation of game-playing agents.
dcterms:title: Polygames
